name: Post Soviet Zombies
detailed_description:
Post soviet zombies - is an action shooter with a top view, in which you have to get out of the infected post-Soviet city for one of the four unique characters. On the way you will meet a variety of zombies, military, marauders and people who need your help in 1993.

In this interesting adventure:

- Many enemies
- Beautiful pixel art graphics
- Dynamic combat system, quite easy to learn and easy to manage
- Each playthrough is unique because of the many random elements
- Survival mode at the time

Unique game characters with their own abilities



A large number of weapons that can be improved as you progress through the game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista
  • Processor: Any Dual Core processor 2.1 GHz (Intel Core 2 Duo)
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Embedded Graphics Solution (Intel HD Graphics)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Any Dual Core processor 2.1 GHz (Intel Core 2 Duo)
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Embedded Graphics Solution (Intel HD Graphics)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The game has blood and murder
